borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: (T1) - Apple(Malus) reduce crown by 25%(1.2m) to below neighbouring property roof line; thin by 15% to allow more air/light through canopy and remove any deadwood and crossing branches;(T2) -Holly(Ilex)-misshapen/poor condition, fell to ground level;(T3) LHS boundary mid-way Norway Maple (Acer platanoides)-reduce large inbound limb overhanging neighbouring property by 4m from tip to suitable union as discussed; remove 2x smaller branches to main trunk collar on opposite flank;(T4) RH rear boundary Sycamore(Acer pseudoplatanus)-remove limb crowing through fence as close to main trunk as possible, lift by removing lowest finer branches, clean lower trunk removing all old dead ivy/climber growth;(T5) Mountain Ash (Sorbus acuparia)-self-set/overly tall/phototropic, fell to ground;All other works are for routine maintenance
